summary: Fully voiced follower, voiced by YouTuber HOCgaming! All dialogue is custom written and voiced for this follower.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS][b][u]Description[/u][/b]
If anyone follows [url=https://twitter.com/EnterElysium]@EnterElysium[/url] or [url=https://twitter.com/HOCgamer]@HOCgaming[/url] on twitter you probably knew this was coming, this mod adds a single follower named Harv to Windhelm outside of Candlehearth Hall, he is a Nord, has a preference for two handed weapons and will help you slay dragons or die trying. He is fully voiced by [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/HOCgaming]HOCgaming[/url] to be a follower and/or spouse, as long as this public release shows nothing wrong he should hopefully be making an appearance in [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/EnterElysium]EnterElysiums Youtube Let's Play of Skyrim[/url]. There are some bits of dialogue for locations and other situations and it's possible more will be added in future.

[youtube]llPugB7mXGo[/youtube]

This is currently the first public release, although it has had a good amount of testing it is difficult to tell for sure that everything is working as it should. Please report any bugs/glitches which came after installing this mod, but please explain more than just 'doesn't work'. I need to know what doesn't work, where you are, what you were doing and what other mods you have.

[b]Name[/b][b]:[/b] [i]Harv[/i][/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS][b]Location[/b]: Windhelm (See screenshot)[/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS][b]Level cap:[/b] [i]Levels with the player to 81 (may be changed in a later update).[/i][/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS][b]Equipment:[/b] [i]Harv starts with Steel Plate armour (minus the helmet) and a Steel Greatsword, he also has some health potions for him to use.[/i][/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS]
[b][u]Requirements[/u][/b][/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS]Only vanilla Skyrim and the latest update are required.

[b][u]Links[/u][/b][/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS]Harv a.k.a HOCgaming[/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS]YouTube: [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/HOCgaming]https://www.youtube.com/user/HOCgaming[/url][/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS]Twitter: [url=https://twitter.com/HOCgamer]https://twitter.com/HOCgamer[/url]

EnterElysium[/font]
[/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS]YouTube: [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/EnterElysium]https://www.youtube.com/user/EnterElysium[/url][/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS]Twitter: [url=https://twitter.com/EnterElysium]https://twitter.com/EnterElysium[/url][/font][/color]
author: durge13 and HOCGaming
